name: Loverz: Dating simulator game
description:
Swipe, flirt, fantasize, fall in love!

Communicate with unique characters, who knows maybe one of them will become your boyfriend or girlfriend. It depends only on your choices how far your relationship will go. Develop your romance by completing more chapters. You will probably be asked out on a date in a romantic place

- SWIPE dozens of unique characters who are waiting to communicate with you
- CHAT with those you like and discover your unique stories together
- IMPROVE your relationship on dates in romantic places
- TURN your imagination on and get the most out of communication

If you like to roleplay, you will definitely get hooked on this game!

* Please note: Loverz is completely free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money. If you choose not to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.


Subscription options:

VIP Weekly offers $9.99 weekly subscription after 3-day free trial for unlocking all content and features.
